meta.description: Optimize the production of candy mixes to maximize profit given candy availability.

sets.name: MIXES
sets.description: Types of candy mixes produced by the store.

params.name: profit
params.description: Profit per kilogram of each candy mix.

params.name: regular_candy_usage
params.description: Kilograms of regular candy used per kilogram of each mix.

params.name: sour_candy_usage
params.description: Kilograms of sour candy used per kilogram of each mix.

params.name: available_regular_candy
params.description: Total kilograms of regular candy available.

params.name: available_sour_candy
params.description: Total kilograms of sour candy available.

vars.name: kg_mix
vars.description: Kilograms of each candy mix to produce.

objective.name: max_profit
objective.expr: sum(profit[mix] * kg_mix[mix] for mix in MIXES)
objective.description: Maximize the total profit from producing candy mixes.

constraints.name: regular_candy_constraint
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(regular_candy_usage[mix] * kg_mix[mix] for mix in MIXES)
constraints.description: Do not exceed the available regular candy.

constraints.name: sour_candy_constraint
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(sour_candy_usage[mix] * kg_mix[mix] for mix in MIXES)
constraints.description: Do not exceed the available sour candy.
